name: Reflections (itch) (callieKitten)
description:
Reflections is out now, a short VN about the trans experience based on stories from myself and friends. Please observe the content warnings!

The game runs in a browser and you can check it out here:
https://callie.zone/reflections/ 

However I understand that some people might not have the bandwidth to run this game, or may be interested in playing offline. For that reason I threw the files together in a zip where you can download it directly from this page.

Please note that if you download it you are going to have to simulate a server to get it to work due to cross-origin requests, so I suggest using the online link unless you absolutely need to.

If you enjoyed it, please share it around!
